Summary: 3 separate sightings same night about 2 hr time span.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailswe were at a friend���s home to watch monday night football and cook out. we were on the deck in the back yard watching the game and grilling around 10:00pm i witnessed a ball of light that was moving at the speed say of a shooting star. initially that is what i thought it was except for how low the object was in the sky and no trail like a meteor would have. low enough that when it tumbled through it was obscured by the tree line. total sighting lasted less than 1 second. i was the only one to witness this light and it had for lack of a better description spikes of light coming from it. so on our way home we were discussing my sighting. we were on kennedy highway in bellevue ne around 11:15 pm. just outside offutt afb! i am now looking in the night sky because of what i had witnessed earlier. i then saw what looked to be a star just appear in the sky. this [portion of the night sky had no objects in it no stars, no planes, i asked my girlfriend what is that and she replied it looks like a star. i said i don���t think it is a star keep your eyes on it while i navigate the highway. she then replied omg it just disappeared. i looked and there was nothing there. it didn���t fly away it just disappeared. the sky was wide open nothing to obscure our vision of the object. so we were merging to interstate 80 when my girlfriend replied omg there it is again. i looked and this time we had a clear shot for about 10 minutes. it was bright but was yellow with lights coming from the bottom and shooting from the top and the sides just like a diamond. this time it was descending! she exclaimed omg its getting lower. it got low enough that it was obscured by the tree line but you could still see it shining through the trees. so again i said you watch it while i merge. to merge on interstate 80w from kennedy freeway we had to go around a curve as we got on 80w i said i see it but now it was on the other side of the highway and my girlfriend exclaimed there���s two of them. they were identical in every facet! look, height in the sky, movement! at this point it was now serious! i was looking at one to my left and she was looking at the one to our right. they were at the same place in the sky height wise. she asked me to pull over. i got off the highway and pulled on to 60th st. we took a left turn off of 60th st onto grover street with both objects in plain sight. i asked are they moving i knew they weren���t i just wanted her confirmation. i said tei i am going to get as close as i can i am going to try and park right underneath it. crazy thought but i just had this need to know what i was looking at! as soon as those words came out of my mouth the object just started moving slowly away. the second object was no longer visible as i was concentrating on the object i wanted to park beneath. i am retired air force. i have worked with f-16���s, f-15���s, f-4,s helicopters, b1, b2, u2 and sr71! i have seen the space shuttle in flight! i worked satellite intelligence for over 14 years and held a top secret security clearance. i know aircraft and what i\we saw last night on 3 separate occasions was not a plane! take it for what it���s worth but this is an accurate account of what we witnessed 28 september 2009! ted
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around September 28th 2009
